sense.def:
Z izrazom
mutual
opišemo nekaj, kar dve ali več oseb naredijo druga drugi ali druga za drugo, ali nekaj, kar občutijo druga do druge.

seg.quote: They are in danger of mutual destruction.
I didn't like him and I was sure the feeling was mutual.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
mutual
opišemo tudi nekaj ali nekoga, kar je skupno dvema ali več ljudem.

seg.quote: They had discovered a mutual interest in rugby football.
He sent a mutual friend to ask me.
